casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Angela Deborah LEWIS. No. 558PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2004. Paul M. Green, Durham, for Lewis. C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2004 by Attorney General:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 2nd day of February 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2004."
